login.no_rest_api_installed: You sure. That a rest api installed ? Check your node!

question.task_name: What should the name of the new task be?
question.memory: What amount of max memory should the new task have? (in MB)
question.maintenance_default: Should the task be in maintenance by default? (this prevents auto starting of the services)
question.auto_delete: Should the services be automatically unregistered out of the cloud after stopping them?
question.static_service: Should the services of this task be static that their files are never deleted
question.service_count: How many services of this task should be always online?
question.task_environment: What should be the environment of this task?
question.start_port: What should be the start port of the task?
question.java_executable: What is the path to the Java executable?
question.service_version: Which ServiceVersion should be ran on services of this task?
question.splitter: What should the splitter of the new task be?
